title: Eastpak transmitter m black denim
description:
• Double deck compartment with zippered closure
  • 360° wheeling system
  • Compression straps
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Top padded handle grip
  • Padded side handle
  • Telescopic handle
  • Kissing sliders and locking ring
  • Stand up straight
description_long: We proudly present the timeless Eastpak Transmitter: the “go everywhere” solution with friends or family! Tailored in elegant and simple lines, this smart suitcase spins on four wheels for maximum stability and rotation in every direction. Ask your partner to dance and head to the airport jetways with elegance! The suitcase includes two roomy main compartments where your clothes may be pleasantly cushioned. Look out for the smaller S-version if you’re planning to head for a pleasant spring break up in the mountains. Go for Transmitter M for more generous volumes!

title: Eastpak striky l um black
description:
• Two main compartments with zippered closure
  • Padded laptop sleeve
  • Zip down front panel for easy access
  • Padded shoulder straps with SGS
  • Zippered inside mesh pocket
  • Comfortable quilted back
description_long: The Striky L backpack has a sporty urban style and enables you to carry all of your essentials with you, including secure transportation of your tablet. With a built-in travel pass holder, top accessory pocket, key clip and board straps, you have all the added extras you need.

title: Eastpak bust merge navy
description:
• Double deck compartment for easy organization
  • 360° spinning wheels
  • Garment elastic straps
  • Zippered front stash pocket
  • Telescopic handle
description_long: The Bust laptop backpack is the ultimate in comfort when carrying those essential extras. Now you can transport basics with ease - the shaped padded shoulder straps mould perfectly to your body type. Ample pockets enable you to stash any important items such as your wallet and car keys.

title: Eastpak spinnerz l black denim
description:
• 360° wheeling system 
  • Main compartment with U-zip opening 
  • Zippered front pocket 
  • Zippered side pocket 
  • Top padded handle grip 
  • Carry handles, usable on shoulder 
  • Garment elastic straps 
  • Kissing sliders and locking ring
description_long: For maximum innovation and style, go for the Spinnerz L option. Its roomy compartment is perfectly tailored to host all your belongings safely and securely and keep them organised thanks to its elastic straps. Toiletry bags, thick winter coats, plenty of trousers and shirts all fit in this practical and extremely durable luggage. For zero effort during transportation, discover its 360o wheeling system.

title: Eastpak pcase oval single monthly
description:
• Zipper to keep your stuff inside!
  • Extra ‘shelf’ to organise your pens
description_long:
Beautifully tailored, this indispensable pencil case is ideal for practical storage. It is zippered and disposes of a dividing section that enables you to keep all your lovely stationery organised. It easily grabs hold of your fluo highlighters, markers and pencils.
The Eastpak Oval comes in a diverse range of funky prints and shades.

title: Eastpak out of office push key
description:
• Laptop sleeve 34 x 29 x 3cm
  • One large main compartment with padded laptop sleeve and zippered mesh pocket
  • Zip down front panel for easy access
  • Front pocket
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
description_long:
Beautifully tailored to host securely your laptop and gear, this Eastpak favourite is ideally made to help you travel with peace of mind! Young businessmen will highly appreciate its zippered pocket that may keep important files safe, while its padded back and shoulder straps provide maximum convenience.

To be enjoyed in a great range of lovely colours and patterns.

title: Eastpak the one plume grey
description:
• Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Main compartment with zippered closure
  • Zippered front, back & inside pockets
description_long: The ONE iconic accessory for everyday needs. Compact and stylish, this shoulder bag will securely store all your essentials and gadgets in its zippered main compartment. For handy access to your keyring, use its practical front pocket and be sure you’ll never lose your keys again! Plus, it offers maximum comfort thanks to its adjustable shoulder strap. Enjoy The One in various colours and patterns.

title: Eastpak pinnacle plume grey
description:
• Zippered front mesh pocket
  • Two large compartments
  • Comfortable quilted padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
  • Front pocket with organizer
  • Detachable key keeper
description_long:
Energetic and on-the-go? The Eastpak Pinnacle is exceptionally tailored with a quilted padded back, providing the number one solution for hi-tech lovers. There’s plenty of space to store your gadgets, featuring organising pockets for all your essentials. This smart backpack even disposes of an adjustable key keeper.
Available in various vivid colours and patterns.

thumb.alt: Eastpak pinnacle plume grey from the front
thumb.title: Eastpak pinnacle plume grey from the front

title: Eastpak tranverz s black denim
description:
• Double deck compartment with zippered closure
  • Compression straps
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Top padded handle grip
  • Side padded handle grip
  • Telescopic handle
  • Lockable zippers
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Stands up straight
description_long:
Smartly tailored, this ideal travel luggage disposes of a double deck storage and a multitude of useful zippered pockets. Pack all your stuff in this spacious smoothly wheeled suitcase and enjoy optimal convenience thanks to its telescopic handle. Most importantly, its side compression straps will help you make the most out of its internal space. Sophisticated styles for smart travellers!

Check out its fashionable colour palette and choose your unique shade.

title: Eastpak rusher sunday grey
description:
• Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Zippered main compartment
  • Two big zippered front pockets
description_long: Always in a rush? Life is easier with the Eastpak Rusher: stow your keys, wallet and smart phone in its two handy front pockets and enjoy a hands free walk thanks to its adjustable shoulder strap. Trendy and functional, it guarantees safety and functionality, both combined in a mini size! Not to be missed!

title: Eastpak kakey m mono navy
description:
• Double deck compartment for easy storage
  • Front pockets
  • Organizer
  • Compression straps
  • Reinforced corners
  • Leather reinforced handle
  • Side handle
  • Garment elastic straps
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Rubberized telescopic handle
  • Lockable zippers
  • ID holder
  • Leather details
  • Extra garment bag included
description_long: An indispensable luggage for the regular traveller! Fullof pockets designed to keep you organised, the Eastpak Kaley M is a robust trolley case with various roomy compartments and a double-deck storage for your extra items. It features a comfortable telescopic handle and an ultra smooth wheeling system to provide maximum convenience while travelling. Choose the colour shade that suits you best and make the most out of it!

title: Eastpak padded pak'r® beigejing
description:
• Large main compartment
  • Zippered front pocket to stash small stuff
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
description_long: An all time classic, the Eastpak Padded Pak’r® is definitely our bestseller. This 24/7 companion adds a casual style to your looks and keeps your items safe in its roomy main compartment. Its super handy front zippered pocket keeps you organised and on-the-go, while its thick padded shoulder back and straps will help your back feel comfortable all day long. To be enjoyed in a wide range of colours and designs.

title: Eastpak buddy double denim
description:
• Main compartment with zippered closure
  • Outside slash pocket
  • Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap
  • Padded music player pocket with headphone cord port
description_long: A grab-and-go clever bag, to be worn in various ways (cross-body, around your neck or shoulder). Disposing of a multitude of external pockets with an extra padded compartment for music players, this cute bag will become your everyday Eastpak Buddy. Most importantly, its straps are adjustable and it even has sealed finished tape seams. A truly smart purchase!

title: Eastpak benchmark single plume grey
description: • Zipper to keep your pencils in
description_long:
A must-have school accessory, ideal for both artists and students with plenty of space to host your fluo highlighters and techpoint pens. A lovely simple case that safeguards your much-beloved stationery in its zippered compartment.
Absolutely adorable, available in both plain colours and attractive patterns.

title: Eastpak fluster merge mix dk
description:
• Main compartment with front pocket
  • Laptop sleeve 35x22CM
  • Shaped padded shoulder straps
  • Multi-purpose side pockets with zip closure
  • Leather details
  • Metal Hardware
  • Matching lining
  • Special webbing
description_long: Smart interior, dashing exterior! The Fluster is superbly crafted to suit your everyday needs, as it offers plenty of space for your laptop and other valuables, as well as a number of extra-handy pockets. The Fluster will also make your long trips super comfy as it features padded shoulder straps and a useful sternum strap. Check it out in other stylish colours too.

title: Eastpak kaley h ash blend2
description:
• Double deck compartment for easy storage
  • Padded laptop sleeve 33x43>CM
  • Front pocket
  • Organizer
  • Compression straps
  • Reinforced corners
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Rubberized telescopic handle
  • Lockable zippers
  • ID holder
  • Leather details
description_long: Compact, smart and uniquely tailored for those who travel light and fast. Its spacious compartment and padded laptop sleeve ensure ultimate protection for your valuables, while its telescopic handle will guarantee a comfortable and enjoyable trip. The Eastpak Kaley H also features an ID holder and compression straps and it meets the hand luggage restrictions of most airlines. Impeccable for the year ahead!

title: Eastpak tranverz l plume grey
description:
• Double deck compartment with zippered closure
  • Compression straps
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Top padded handle grip
  • Side padded handle grip
  • Telescopic handle
  • Garment elastic straps
  • Lockable zippers
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Stands up straight
description_long: Arriving in Amsterdam mid-July? You will absolutely need a smooth wheel system and an extra roomy interior to make the most out of your urban trip! The Eastpak Tranverz L will protect all your belongings and travel essentials, while its various compartments will host those everyday items (making them even more accessible when squeezed in the bus or when in a hurry to catch the plane). Did we mention that the Tranverz L comes in a wide variety of stylish patterns and fabulous colours?

title: Eastpak tutor midnight
description:
• Two main compartments
  • Padded laptop sleeve with zipper on the side for easy access
  • Shaped padded shoulder straps with SGS
  • Sternum strap
  • Multiple zippered front pockets
  • Organizer
  • Detachable key clip
  • Top accessory pocket
  • Rubber molded handle
  • Padded bottom for books
description_long: Always out and about? Think of the Tutor: a truly functional passe-partout bag with a multitude of pockets for all your belongings. Store your head phones, keys and agenda in the front pocket and protect your laptop and folders in one of its large main compartments. You can access your belongings from both inside and outside of the bag, while it also features a side bottle holder and a detachable key clip for optimum convenience. Meet the Tutor in more urban colours.

description:
• Padded laptop sleeve 45x30cm
  • Main compartment with front pocket
  • Zip down front panel for easy access

  • Multiple zippered front pockets
  • Front slash pocket with hook and loop closure
  • Comfortable padded back

  • Leather details
  • Leather bottom
description_long: With its retro touch, the Eastpak Sugarbrush revives the classic old school design and adds a good dose of style to your urban looks. It features a large main section with a separate padded sleeve to ensure your laptop’s protection, as well as extra pockets for all your valuables: stow your keys, smart phone and tablet and head off to your new urban adventure! Available in a diverse range of colours.

title: Eastpak tomec russet leather
description:
• Padded laptop sleeve 28x39CM
    • Main compartment with zippered closure
    • Adjustable and detachable padded shoulder strap
    • Two zippered front pockets
    • Carry handles
    • Metal hardware
    • highly durable full grain leather, this fabric ages beautifully and gives it a vintage look
description_long: Crafted with soft leather and lots of imagination, the Tomec is reminiscent of old school days! Its urban character offers an ultimate experience and lots of style when carrying this beautifully tailored bag. Featuring a multitude of pockets and compartments that offer maximal protection to your tablet or laptop, this outstanding bag will undeniably become your best partner. Carry it around your shoulder or go for a smarter effect: choose the hand straps!

description:
• Main compartment with zippered closure
  • Adjustable waist belt
  • Back zippered pocket
description_long:
No need to worry about the safety of your everyday essentials: the ultimate handy bag is here! For tension-free, comfy walks and everyday activities, the Eastpak Springer will become your inseparable friend. And most importantly, its zippered security pocket means there’s plenty of space for your can’t-live-without items: smart phone, wallet and keys. Keep it secure on your waist thanks to its adjustable waist strap.

Check out the Springer’s colour palette and choose your own unique colour or pattern.

  • Compression straps
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Top padded handle grip
  • Side padded handle grip
  • Telescopic handle
  • Garment elastic straps
  • Lockable zippers
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Stands up straight
description_long: Arriving in Amsterdam mid-July? You will absolutely need a smooth wheel system and an extra roomy interior to make the most out of your urban trip! The Eastpak Tranverz L will protect all your belongings and travel essentials, while its various compartments will host those everyday items (making them even more accessible when squeezed in the bus or when in a hurry to catch the plane). Did we mention that the Tranverz L comes in a wide variety of stylish patterns and fabulous colours?

title: Eastpak tranverz m plume grey
description:
• Double deck compartment with zippered closure
  • Compression straps
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Top padded handle grip
  • Side padded handle grip
  • Telescopic handle
  • Garment elastic straps
  • Lockable zippers
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Stands up straight
description_long:
Eye-catching and vibrant, the Tranverz M is probably one of Eastpak’s masterpieces! Are you a new student on campus? Or maybe a frequent business traveller? You will undoubtedly adore its spacious, double layered storage and multiple zippered sections, while its smooth wheeled system will make sure you achieve optimal convenience. Moreover, its extendable handle is surely a boon to all travellers.

Available in a wide range of vibrant shades and designs.

title: Eastpak rivel merge navy
description:
• Main compartment
  • Padded laptop sleeve 33x33CM
  • Compression straps
  • Side pockets
  • Two carry handles usable on shoulders
  • Front pockets
  • Back pocket
  • Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap
  • Leather details
  • Special webbing
  • Metal hardware
  • Matching lining
description_long: Supremely tailored and amazingly functional, the Rivel combines a unique design with a comfortable interior. Its main compartment features a padded sleeve where you can store your tablet or 13’’ laptop. Carry it over the shoulder or as a briefcase thanks to its double straps and add a good dose of style to your urban looks. Tiny items will definitely find their place in its smartly crafted pockets.

title: Eastpak flex black
description:
• Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Main compartment with zippered closure
  • Inside pocket
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Back slash pocket with hook & loop closure
description_long: Move fast with this most beloved cross body bag, ideally crafted for daily adventures and activities. This iconic small bag is undeniably the best choice to stow your little essentials for a quick shopping tour or a sunny walk in the park. Add a little jewel to your life: it has it all!

title: Eastpak orbit san franpinko
description:
• One main compartment
  • Front pocket
  • Comfortable padded back
  • slimmer straps for a comfort fit
description_long:
It’s sweet, it’s chic! A most beloved smaller version of the classic Padded Pak'R®®®, Eastpak Orbit is the ideal solution for day trips and weekend getaways to the countryside. Its ergonomic design, padded back and straps will make the weight feel lighter, while its roomy inner compartment is perfect for keeping your little things safe and sound.

Available in a wide variety of colours and designs.

title: Eastpak delegate bloxx core
description:
• Main compartment with zippered closure
  • Adjustable and detachable padded shoulder strap with SGS
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Two slash pockets under flap
  • Back slash pocket with hook & loop closure
  • Buckle closure on front flap
  • Expandable zipper system for extra volume
description_long:
Sleek and stylish, the Eastpak Delegate is the ideal messenger bag for organised students and professionals. Store your folders, notes and laptop in this reliable companion and carry it anywhere: at work, at school or even at the park!

The Eastpak Delegate is available in a large variety of funky patterns and colours.

title: Eastpak padded pak'r® plume green
description:
• Large main compartment
  • Zippered front pocket to stash small stuff
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
description_long: An all time classic, the Eastpak Padded Pak’r® is definitely our bestseller. This 24/7 companion adds a casual style to your looks and keeps your items safe in its roomy main compartment. Its super handy front zippered pocket keeps you organised and on-the-go, while its thick padded shoulder back and straps will help your back feel comfortable all day long. To be enjoyed in a wide range of colours and designs.

description_long:
Beautifully tailored to host securely your laptop and gear, this Eastpak favourite is ideally made to help you travel with peace of mind! Young businessmen will highly appreciate its zippered pocket that may keep important files safe, while its padded back and shoulder straps provide maximum convenience.

To be enjoyed in a great range of lovely colours and patterns.

description_long: A stylish and elegant option to protect your favourite gadget. Perfectly matching your tablet’s shape, this best-selling folder is a must-have for both professionals and students. Its zippered compartment offers optimal protection to your tablet, especially when carrying the device in another case. Highly recommended as a gift to hi-tech lovers.

description_long:
Grab-and-go! Featuring two main roomy compartments and a padded laptop sleeve for optimal security, the Eastpak Provider will become your most reliable mate. Especially designed to host all your gear and techy kits, this backpack provides super convenience thanks to its little extras that will help you keep organized, such as the ultimate key keeper, a perfect accessory for energetic users!

Make the most out of the Eastpak Provider, available in a wide variety of urban colours and patterns!

title: Eastpak kakey s mono navy
description:
• Double deck compartment for easy storage
  • Padded laptop sleeve 40x33.5CM

description_long: For carefree travelling, ultimate security and convenience, go for the Eastpak Kaley S, a smartly crafted travel trolley, ideal for any destination. Its roomy compartment offers a double-decker storage for more efficient packing, while it ensures maximum security for your 15” laptop thanks to its padded sleeve. Check its diverse colour palette or the M version for larger storage.

title: Eastpak rusher double denim
description:
• Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Zippered main compartment
  • Two big zippered front pockets
description_long: Always in a rush? Life is easier with the Eastpak Rusher: stow your keys, wallet and smart phone in its two handy front pockets and enjoy a hands free walk thanks to its adjustable shoulder strap. Trendy and functional, it guarantees safety and functionality, both combined in a mini size! Not to be missed!

title: Eastpak benchmark pensilcase san franpinko
description: • Zipper to keep your pencils in
description_long:
A must-have school accessory, ideal for both artists and students with plenty of space to host your fluo highlighters and techpoint pens. A lovely simple case that safeguards your much-beloved stationery in its zippered compartment.
Absolutely adorable, available in both plain colours and attractive patterns.

description_long: With its retro touch, the Eastpak Sugarbrush revives the classic old school design and adds a good dose of style to your urban looks. It features a large main section with a separate padded sleeve to ensure your laptop’s protection, as well as extra pockets for all your valuables: stow your keys, smart phone and tablet and head off to your new urban adventure! Available in a diverse range of colours.

description:
• Laptop sleeve 40 x 29cm
  • Main compartment with front pocket
  • multi-purpose side pockets with zip closure
  • Padded shoulder straps with SGS
  • Leather bottom

description_long:
Probably one of the most efficient and travel-friendly backpacks, this exceptional bag is the ideal choice for both everyday activities and extreme adventures. Keep all your necessities close to hand thanks to its multiple pockets and restlessly carry this comfortable backpack, combining both style and functionality.

Featuring two adjustable shoulder straps and a padded back, this backpack also ensures your equipment stays safe and secure, whether you’re heading off to a long weekend, or to a backcountry adventure.

• Zipper to keep your stuff inside!

Beautifully tailored, this indispensable pencil case is ideal for practical storage. It is zippered and disposes of a dividing section that enables you to keep all your lovely stationery organised. It easily grabs hold of your fluo highlighters, markers and pencils.
The Eastpak Oval comes in a diverse range of funky prints and shades.

title: Eastpak tutor black denim
description:
• Two main compartments
  • Padded laptop sleeve with zipper on the side for easy access
  • Shaped padded shoulder straps with SGS
  • Sternum strap
  • Multiple zippered front pockets
  • Organizer
  • Detachable key clip
  • Top accessory pocket
  • Rubber molded handle
  • Padded bottom for books
description_long: Always out and about? Think of the Tutor: a truly functional passe-partout bag with a multitude of pockets for all your belongings. Store your head phones, keys and agenda in the front pocket and protect your laptop and folders in one of its large main compartments. You can access your belongings from both inside and outside of the bag, while it also features a side bottle holder and a detachable key clip for optimum convenience. Meet the Tutor in more urban colours.

Grab your own bum bag and enjoy those outdoor festivals!

Grab-and-go! Featuring two main roomy compartments and a padded laptop sleeve for optimal security, the Eastpak Provider will become your most reliable mate. Especially designed to host all your gear and techy kits, this backpack provides super convenience thanks to its little extras that will help you keep organized, such as the ultimate key keeper, a perfect accessory for energetic users!

Make the most out of the Eastpak Provider, available in a wide variety of urban colours and patterns!

title: Eastpak out of office plume grey
description:
• Laptop sleeve 34 x 29 x 3cm
  • One large main compartment with padded laptop sleeve and zippered mesh pocket
  • Zip down front panel for easy access
  • Front pocket
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
description_long:
Beautifully tailored to host securely your laptop and gear, this Eastpak favourite is ideally made to help you travel with peace of mind! Young businessmen will highly appreciate its zippered pocket that may keep important files safe, while its padded back and shoulder straps provide maximum convenience.

To be enjoyed in a great range of lovely colours and patterns.

title: Eastpak tranverz m black denim
description:
• Double deck compartment with zippered closure
  • Compression straps
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Top padded handle grip
  • Side padded handle grip
  • Telescopic handle
  • Garment elastic straps
  • Lockable zippers
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Stands up straight
description_long:
Eye-catching and vibrant, the Tranverz M is probably one of Eastpak’s masterpieces! Are you a new student on campus? Or maybe a frequent business traveller? You will undoubtedly adore its spacious, double layered storage and multiple zippered sections, while its smooth wheeled system will make sure you achieve optimal convenience. Moreover, its extendable handle is surely a boon to all travellers.

Available in a wide range of vibrant shades and designs.

title: Eastpak crew single lether russet
description:
• Tri-fold velcro closure
  • Back center zippered compartment
  • Multi-compartment interior
  • Ring to attach key-chain
  • highly durable full grain leather, this fabric ages beautifully and gives it a vintage look
description_long: Hide your treasure in this fabulous tri-fold wallet with velcro closure and make the most out of its multiple sections. The Eastpak Crew has just the right pocket for keeping your coins safe, while it securely hosts your cash and cards. Thanks to its practical ring, you can also attach it to your key ring. A super soft leather and a vintage look for a fresh style.

title: Eastpak tranverz s plume grey
description:
• Double deck compartment with zippered closure
  • Compression straps
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Top padded handle grip
  • Side padded handle grip
  • Telescopic handle
  • Lockable zippers
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Stands up straight
description_long:
Smartly tailored, this ideal travel luggage disposes of a double deck storage and a multitude of useful zippered pockets. Pack all your stuff in this spacious smoothly wheeled suitcase and enjoy optimal convenience thanks to its telescopic handle. Most importantly, its side compression straps will help you make the most out of its internal space. Sophisticated styles for smart travellers!

Check out its fashionable colour palette and choose your unique shade.

title: Eastpak frick lether russet
description:
• Main compartment with zippered closure
  • Zippered front pocket
  • slimmer straps for a comfort fit
  • Comfortable padded back
  • highly durable full grain leather, this fabric ages beautifully and gives it a vintage look
description_long: A bestselling rucksack combining a retro leather style and ultimate functionality. Suitable for all kinds of activities, the Frick has a spacious main compartment and a smartly tailored front pocket for your grab-and-go items. Thanks to its padded back and shoulder straps, your back will enjoy a comfy walk in the woods or a stroll around the campus. The bag is made of an exceptional highly durable full grain leather, superbly aging through time, adding a retro touch to your new companion.

title: Eastpak delegate bloxx black
description:
• Main compartment with zippered closure
  • Adjustable and detachable padded shoulder strap with SGS
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Two slash pockets under flap
  • Back slash pocket with hook & loop closure
  • Buckle closure on front flap
  • Expandable zipper system for extra volume
description_long:
Sleek and stylish, the Eastpak Delegate is the ideal messenger bag for organised students and professionals. Store your folders, notes and laptop in this reliable companion and carry it anywhere: at work, at school or even at the park!

The Eastpak Delegate is available in a large variety of funky patterns and colours.

title: Eastpak kakey s blend2
description:
• Double deck compartment for easy storage
  • Padded laptop sleeve 40x33.5CM
  • Front pocket
  • Organizer
  • Top accessory pocket
  • Compression straps
  • Reinforced corners
  • Side handle
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Rubberized telescopic handle
  • Lockable zippers
  • ID holder
  • Leather details
  • Extra garment bag included
description_long: For carefree travelling, ultimate security and convenience, go for the Eastpak Kaley S, a smartly crafted travel trolley, ideal for any destination. Its roomy compartment offers a double-decker storage for more efficient packing, while it ensures maximum security for your 15” laptop thanks to its padded sleeve. Check its diverse colour palette or the M version for larger storage.

title: Eastpak padded pak'r® kilimanja grey
description:
• Large main compartment
  • Zippered front pocket to stash small stuff
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
description_long: An all time classic, the Eastpak Padded Pak’r® is definitely our bestseller. This 24/7 companion adds a casual style to your looks and keeps your items safe in its roomy main compartment. Its super handy front zippered pocket keeps you organised and on-the-go, while its thick padded shoulder back and straps will help your back feel comfortable all day long. To be enjoyed in a wide range of colours and designs.

title: Eastpak pinnacle plume blue
description:
• Zippered front mesh pocket
  • Two large compartments
  • Comfortable quilted padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
  • Front pocket with organizer
  • Detachable key keeper
description_long:
Energetic and on-the-go? The Eastpak Pinnacle is exceptionally tailored with a quilted padded back, providing the number one solution for hi-tech lovers. There’s plenty of space to store your gadgets, featuring organising pockets for all your essentials. This smart backpack even disposes of an adjustable key keeper.
Available in various vivid colours and patterns.

title: Eastpak kover mini single bluedale
description: • Main compartment with zippered closure
description_long: Elegance is the key word! Store your tablet safely and securely in this durable folder and enjoy optimal convenience. Especially tailored to protect your technology, this elegant folder is a brilliantly functional and lightweight case, perfect for business enthusiasts and organised students.

title: Eastpak kaley h black2
description:
• Double deck compartment for easy storage
  • Padded laptop sleeve 33x43>CM
  • Front pocket
  • Organizer
  • Compression straps
  • Reinforced corners
  • Smooth wheeling system
  • Rubberized telescopic handle
  • Lockable zippers
  • ID holder
  • Leather details
description_long: Compact, smart and uniquely tailored for those who travel light and fast. Its spacious compartment and padded laptop sleeve ensure ultimate protection for your valuables, while its telescopic handle will guarantee a comfortable and enjoyable trip. The Eastpak Kaley H also features an ID holder and compression straps and it meets the hand luggage restrictions of most airlines. Impeccable for the year ahead!

title: Eastpak senior black
description:
• Main compartment with zippered and buckle closure
  • Padded laptop sleeve with zipper on the side for easy access
  • Attachable and detachable padded shoulder strap with anti-slip patch
  • Organizer
  • Top carry handle
  • Trolley strap to slide over telescopic handle
description_long: For the tech savvies on-the-go, the Eastpak Senior is designed to meet all their requirements. Combining modern style with functionality, this practical messenger bag disposes of a buckle closure to ensure maximum security for your gear, while featuring a padded laptop sleeve for extra security. All in one!
